title: Usage
text: Load library let’s read lock file. paths named, used downstream functions else named automatically. can get useful information lockfile. can also explore data explore list. default read list. Change format tibble read table.   Note list tibble formats may identical information depending input especially case NAs NULLs. gives tibble package information. Now can handle like tibble. Read several lock files get list tibbles list lists.

title: Usage
text: Filter packages needed write new lock file.   Reading loackfile writing may give identical lockfiles NAs NULLs may discarded.
code: # exclude bioconductor packages tbl1 <- tbl |> filter(Source != "Bioconductor") write_lock(tbl1, "renv-mod.lock")

title: Usage
text: Summarize multiple lock files. example, visualize difference number packages lockfiles. Note step requires additional package.
code: paths <- list.files(system.file("extdata", package = "renvtools"), full.names = TRUE) l <- read_lock(paths, format = "list") d <- summarize_locks(l) d # A tibble: 7 x 8   label rver  renvver pkgs_len repositories sources      pkgs       pkgs_req   <chr> <chr> <chr>      <int> <named list> <named list> <named li> <named list> 1 lf_1  3.5.3 0.9.2        197 <df [0 x 1]> <df [2 x 2]> <chr>      <named list> 2 lf_2  3.6.1 0.11.0       168 <df [1 x 2]> <df [1 x 2]> <chr>      <named list> 3 lf_3  4.0.5 0.16.0       424 <df [1 x 2]> <df [1 x 2]> <chr>      <named list> 4 lf_4  4.1.2 1.0.3        391 <df [3 x 2]> <df [1 x 2]> <chr>      <named list> 5 lf_5  4.2.2 1.0.4        256 <df [1 x 2]> <df [3 x 2]> <chr>      <named list> 6 lf_6  4.3.2 1.0.3        668 <df [3 x 2]> <df [3 x 2]> <chr>      <named list> 7 lf_7  4.4.1 1.0.7        294 <df [3 x 2]> <df [4 x 2]> <chr>      <named list> library(UpSetR) lst <- d$pkgs names(lst) <- basename(paths) upset(fromList(lst), order.by = "freq")
